attributes.action: abolish charges made by Doctors to sign health related forms in respect of weight loss
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Doctor's currently make charges for signing a variety of forms.  Some weight loss systems require a signature from their doctor's confirming medical history.  These charges are as high as £30 thereby deterring many from attempting to lose weight.  Given the rise of obesity levels in the UK, we feel a doctor’s signature to assist in weight loss should come free under the NHS.
